thread.title: Music director Ravindra Jain dead

title: Music director Ravindra Jain dead
text: Music director Ravindra Jain dead Friday, 9 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) Mumbai, Oct 9 : Renowned music director Ravindra Jain, an exponent of Rabindra Sangeet, died here on Friday evening following a prolonged illness, an aide said. Visually handicapped music director Ravindra Jain is critically ill and had to be airlifted to Mumbai for treatment. Recent related news Veteran music director and lyricist Ravindra Jain, who was undergoing treatment at Lilavati Hospital in Mumbai, passed away at 4:10 pm today.
